member_organisations:
The members of the assotiation are: Tandem Social SCCL, Fundació Intermedia, Fundació Gentis, Fundació JOIA and fundació formació i Treball. 
Our assessing council is composed by: Ajuntament de Barcelona (townhall of Barcelona), Diplocat, Fundació Catalunya-La Pedrera, Fundació La Caixa, Fundació FC Barcelona. 
The information can be consulted here: https://www.sbcbarcelona.org/qui-som/#presentacio
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Culture and media, Trade, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, External Relations, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Migration and asylum
eu_initiatives:
We are interested in all initiatives related to the social economy and social enterprises. Both at a legislative level, as support initiatives and financing of these projects. Finally, since we belong to a network of universities, we also have an interest in research projects related to the social economy. 
We are interested in the following programmes: 
Social Business Iniciative (http://ec.europa.eu/growth/sectors/social-economy/enterprises_en); H2020 programme; EASI and COSME.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
commission_expert_groups_and_other_simil: Commission expert group on social economy and social enterprises #E03576#http://ec.europa.eu/transparency/regexpert/index.cfm?do=groupDetail.groupDetail&groupID=3576#Member#C
relevant_communication:
We participate in the assessing council of the RaiSE Interreg project (https://www.interregeurope.eu/raise/) 
We have an agreement with Yunus Center and we participate in the neetwork of Social Business Cities. 
The last conference we have organised with the assistance of 91 persons (https://www.sbcbarcelona.org/2018/07/03/lempresa-social-oportunitat-de-futur/)  
We have published a social business case study book: https://www.sbcbarcelona.org/2018/07/05/noves-tendencies-en-la-creacio-i-gestio-dempreses-socials/
goals__remit:
Our mission is to work on the promotion and dissemination of social business and its capacity to transform social needs. 
We do it through 4 objectives: to accompany the creation of new social business; to promote the education and generation of knowledge of students and teachers in social business; to raise awareness of the importance of social business and to generate opinion and make political and social advocacy in the areas of interest of the social business.
